name: Holiday Inn Dresden

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel for a quick, one night visit to Dresden. Service was overburdened during much of the stay, and seemed to start from the attitude of the customer is wrong and we cannot trust the customer. I think this was because over an overburdened, over worked staff person. My hotel rate was booked from the priority club website, and it included free internet access. When I asked for the password for the free internet access, I had to prove to the hotel that i had received such a rate. Fortunately, I had a copy of the reservation on my ipad, but then I was told that I needed to email that to the hotel or they would charge me!
reviews.title: Superb location, brisk and overburdened service

reviews.text: Breakfast was great, but extremely busy, the hotel puts up signs to help people understand when the breakfast will not be as busy, but since major attractions in Dresden open late (generally 10am) most people are all trying to eat breakfast at the same time. We came during one of the "yellow" times and had difficulty finding a seat for breakfast for our party of 3.
reviews.title: Superb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beds were the least comfortable of a 10 night stay in five different hotels in Germany.
reviews.title: "Good Location Near The Train Station!!"

reviews.text: Room facilities otherwise were fantastic - including a tea kettle - very rare in Germany.
reviews.title: Relaxing Stay - Quiet Location yet Conveniently Connected
nice, clean, great pool
reviews.text: Parking was full, had to park across the street, which worked just fine, and was 9.50 euro less than the 15 euros wanted to park in the hotel.
I stayed one night - they were full the following night - I guess in hindsight I should be pleased. It isn't a cheap touristy hotel - it's a business hotel and prices are in accordance.
reviews.title: Not memorable

reviews.text: It just happened to be the first hotel I spotted early in the evening and just wanted a room with a shower.
reviews.title: A good place to stay

reviews.text: It is teamed with the adjacent Best Western and one knew the other was full so why they have two entrances and two managements is open to question but nothing to do with me.
reviews.title: Room OK, staff not quite so

likes.disliked: — Poor dinner service, poor directions for people using public transportation

reviews.text: It was Germanically efficient and as I said not memorable for anything.
reviews.title: Very pleasant stay

reviews.text: With better planning I would have found an hotel nearer to the city center.
reviews.title: Good clean Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for three nights. While it's true that the location is not the best, it still was quiet safe and an easy walk to cheap public transportation. The room was spacious and clean, lots of storage and the bed was comfortable. They have an in house restaurant, which looked inviting, but we ate in the city, so we did not try it. The bar next to the reception offered cold beer from the tap at a reasonable price. In the basement is a fitness center, with indoor pool and two different kind of saunas. The staff was super friendly and very helpful.
reviews.title: Highly recommend

reviews.text: Everything was great, but especailly bed and pillow comfort was excellent.
reviews.title: Excellent sleep!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great value for money!
reviews.title: Very Comfortable Hotel - Location is not the Best!

reviews.text: We spent two lovely nights in this hotel. Our room was very clean and the decor was tasteful. The hotel is not located downtown though and is a good 15 minute tram ride to the old town. There's a tram stop very close to the hotel, which is convenient. The hotel is only a few minutes from the Neustadt, which is filled with lovely bars and restaurants and is great to go out in in the evening!
reviews.title: Excellent service and pleasant stay
the best i ever visited i give it 5 stars
reviews.text: I stayed at the Holiday Inn for one night. The location is great, if you arrrive by car as its very close to the highway and airport and also not too far to the city center.
I booked a very good value package 2 nights for the price of 1 making our stay in this hotel around 43 EUR per night.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At first we were given quite a 1980's style bedroom with the wrong bed combination, however it was no problem to change this and we actually received a much nicer room, lots of space, air conditioning and there is free wifi working across the hotel.
reviews.title: Very happy with my stay

reviews.text: Its not too difficult to find this hotel although it is not really in central Dresden but there is a tram stop nearby the hotel. Its probably really useful if you arrive by car as there is free parking available onsite.
reviews.title: Wow. I was really surprised. I felt...

reviews.text: The hotel staff were very helpful, and nothing seemed too much trouble... It seems to be very well run. The only disappointment was that on one evening the sauna was closed with no explanation why... Hotels should really provide all the services they list or at least offer a way to apologise to disappointed guests.
reviews.title: Excellent Value!

reviews.text: Finally, I took a breakfast on one morning, as I had a coupon for a free breakfast, otherwise the cost would have been 17 EUR. The breakfast was fine, although there was not a huge choice of items - especially the hot dishes... I would have been very disappointed had I actually paid this amount of money for breakfast.
reviews.title: Totally Satisfied !

description: From the hotel Holiday Inn Dresden in the heart of Dresden’s Neustadt you can quickly and easily reach the baroque old town centre, the central station, the airport and the motorway. Part of the free amenities are: Sky- TV, coffee and tea bar, W-LAN Internet access, parking and use of the body&soul™ spa facility.
